message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to you at $1,000,000. I understand its significance and would like to offer it to you at a special price tailored to make this opportunity accessible. My proposal is to offer the product to you for $950,000. This price not only ensures a substantial return for us but also allows you to acquire an asset of such high value at a premium yet reasonable cost. I believe this is a win-win situation for both parties. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or finalizing the transaction.
